lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal defeated Andy Murray in straight sets to join Roger Federer and Novak Djokovic in the quarterfinals of the Hamburg Masters in Germany. Nadal won, 6-3, 6-2, and will face Carlos Moyá, who outlasted Marat Safin, 6-2, 6-7 (3), 6-1.
snippet: Rafael Nadal defeated Andy Murray in straight sets to join Roger Federer and Novak Djokovic in the quarterfinals of the Hamburg Masters in Germany. Nadal won, 6-3, 6-2, and will face Carlos Moyá, who outlasted Marat Safin, 6-2, 6-7 (3), 6-1.
